# RecognizedItem.Bounds

**Structure**

An object that represents the four corners of a recognized item.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Bounds
```

## Getting the corners of items

- **topLeft**: The upper-left corner of the recognized item in view coordinates.
- **topRight**: The upper-right corner of the recognized item in view coordinates.
- **bottomRight**: The lower-right corner of the recognized item in view coordinates.
- **bottomLeft**: The lower-left corner of the recognized item in view coordinates.

## Item location

- **bounds**: The four corners of the recognized item in view coordinates.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The upper-left corner of the recognized item in view coordinates.
items.name: topLeft

items.description: The upper-right corner of the recognized item in view coordinates.
items.name: topRight

items.description: The lower-right corner of the recognized item in view coordinates.
items.name: bottomRight

items.description: The lower-left corner of the recognized item in view coordinates.
items.name: bottomLeft

items.description: The four corners of the recognized item in view coordinates.
items.name: bounds
